content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates; current state shows fuel inventory with 7 coal, energy 1600.0, and warning “no ingredients to smelt.”
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) used for processing copper ore into copper plates; after extractions the furnace result inventory now holds ≈10 copper plates, status remains NO_FUEL with warning [“out of fuel”].

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System (Integrated System)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5) used for automation research; current lab input is {'automation-science-pack': 17}, status NO_RESEARCH_IN_PROGRESS and electrical_id updated to 1945.
- Boiler at position (x=-5.5, y=24.0) producing steam; recently refueled to show fuel inventory {'coal': 17}, energy 2000.0, status WORKING, with connection points at (x=-7.5, y=24.5) and (x=-3.5, y=24.5) and a fluid box containing water (amount ≈199.975, temperature 15).
- Generator (Steam Engine) at position (x=-0.5, y=24.5) converting steam into electrical power; now with energy 14958.33, status WORKING, connection points at (x=-0.5, y=22.0) and (x=-0.5, y=27.0), and a fluid box holding steam (amount ≈145.01 at temperature 165).
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5) providing water supply.
- Electricity Group comprising several small electric poles (including positions such as (x=0.5, y=14.5), (x=-7.5, y=15.5), (x=-4.5, y=15.5), (x=-0.5, y=11.5), (x=-2.5, y=13.5), (x=-2.5, y=24.5), etc.) now with voltage 20444.
- Pipe Groups forming the fluid network:
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=2424) at position (x=-10.5, y=16.5) with status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=2425) at position (x=-12.5, y=18.5) with status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=2427, fluid=water) at position (x=-8.5, y=20.5) with status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=2429, fluid=steam) at position (x=-2.5, y=21.5) with status WORKING.

### Copper Cable Factory at position (x=1.5, y=19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- AssemblingMachine1 at position (x=1.5, y=19.5) configured with the copper-cable recipe. Its details have been updated throughout:
   • Initially experienced output clearance errors and later received extra copper plates.
   • Latest update shows electrical_id 1945, energy ≈1377.78, and warnings [“cannot create copper-cable due to missing resources: copper-plate (1)”] with status ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE.
   • Neighbours include small electric poles at positions (x=-0.5, y=17.5), (x=-0.5, y=19.5), (x=3.5, y=19.5), a pipe at (x=-0.5, y=21.5), and the associated output chest.
- Output Chest at position (x=1.5, y=21.5) designated for receiving copper-cable; remains in NORMAL status.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- AssemblingMachine Output Extraction/Insertion Errors:
  • Verify that the assembling machine’s output is valid before transferring items. Ensure variables (e.g. one holding extracted copper-cable) are properly defined and populated to avoid undefined variable errors during insertion.
  
- Fluid Connection Interface Errors:
  • Confirm that fluid outputs from pipes match the expectations of the target entity. Before connecting the Boiler to the Generator, check that the source pipe’s inventory and type align with the receiving Steam Engine’s requirements.
  
- Placement and Recipe Configuration Issues (from previous steps):
  • Ensure that any entity placement occurs on unobstructed tiles with appropriate spacing to prevent collisions.
  • Confirm that assembling machines are correctly referenced during recipe configuration to avoid misassignment.
  
- Buildable Area and Ingredient Supply Synchronization:
  • Treat all position objects as valid data and verify center positions for buildable area searches.
  • Synchronize the extraction of copper plates from furnaces with their timely insertion into assemblers to maintain ingredient supply.
  
- Power Connectivity:
  • Re-assess electrical grid integration to ensure that electric poles are properly connected, addressing warnings about missing power even after connection attempts.
